span.style: font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-weight: normal; color: #550000; font-style: normal
font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 调情的女子： a woman who makes teasing sexual or romantic overtures; a flirt
【例】 A coquette though she might appear to be at first, Violetta is actually yearning for true love.
【近】 vamp, flirt
【考法 2】 v. 不认真对待： to deal with something playfully rather than seriously
【例】 interested only in coquetting with her, not marrying her 只想与她保持暧昧关系，而不结婚
【近】 trifle, dally, flirt, mess around
【派】 coquet v. 不认真对待，调情；coquettish adj. 调情的
【记】 cock是公鸡；发音qu=k=ck coqu + et小，小母鸡；形容卖弄风情的女人
【另】 etiquette 礼节
